name: Xcel Axis 5/4mm Full-body Wetsuit - Men's
description: Extend your surf season with this full-body Xcel wetsuit. The plush, warm lining on the chest panel dries fast, so there’s no fuss getting into it day after day. 5mm neoprene through key heat-loss zones provides awesome insulation to keep you warm. 4mm paneling in high-motion areas won’t get in the way when you're paddling past the break or catching a wave.5mm neoprene keeps your core warm. Lighter 4mm panelling at extremities increases mobility.Xcel Nanoprene Lite uses earth-mined limestone in place of petrochemicals to reduce the suit's carbon footprint.Watertight zipper prevent flushing.Plush Thermo Lite traps warmth around your torso.Collar is made of durable nylon.Stress-points are taped to spread the load and prevent premature wear.Glued and blind-stitched seams to increase durability.Back zipper.Recommended for use in water temperatures from 9 to 13˚C.
